item.title: Big big question (at least to me)
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Well…If you want to use object inits for a weapon…Go ahead. Isn’t going to work out very well, but have fun.

Well, here’s some inits then since you are not answering…:

[code]Npcs Inits: (class5.java)

if(i == NPCID) {
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”;

class5.aString65 = “#####”; //name
class5.anInt61 = 200;
class5.aByteArray89 = “#####”.getBytes(); //examine info

class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1];
class5.anIntArray94[0] = ####; //Npc model
}

Platebody Inits: (class8.java)

if(i == ####) // item id
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925;
class8.anInt174 = ####; //drop model
class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = #####;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = #####;//female wearing
class8.anInt164 = #####;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = #####;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “@@@@@”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “@@@@@@”.getBytes();//examin info
}

Weapon Inits: (class8.java)

if(i == #####) { item ID
    class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
    class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option
    class8.anInt174 = #####; //drop model
    class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller
    class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
    class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
    class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right
    class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
    class8.anInt165 = #####;//male wearing model//
    class8.anInt200 = #####;//female wearing model// 
    class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves //
    class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // 
    class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
    class8.aString170 = "@@@@@@@@@@@";//Name of the new item
    class8.aByteArray178 = "@@@@@@@".getBytes();//examin info
}

Armour Inits: (class8.java)

if(i == ####) { //Item ID
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [3];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0xD4E7;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 0xDFC0;
class8.anIntArray156[2] = 0xD3A7;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8128;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 9126;
class8.anIntArray160[2] = 8128;
class8.anInt174 = #####; //drop id
class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom
class8.anInt190 = 572;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = #####; //Male id
class8.anInt200 = #####; //Female id
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “@@@@@@@”; //item name
class8.aByteArray178 = “@@@@@”.getBytes(); //examine info
}

Object Inits: (class46.java)

    if(i == #####)// Desired Object id
    {
        class46.aString739 = "@@@@@@"; //object name
        class46.aByteArray777 = "@@@@@@@@@@@".getBytes(); //examine info
        class46.anInt744 = 1;
        class46.anInt761 = 1;
        class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1];
        class46.anIntArray773[0] = #####; // Model id
        class46.aBoolean778 = true;
        class46.aBoolean767 = false;
        class46.aBoolean762 = false;
        class46.aBoolean769 = false;
    }

[/code]
